value.0:
This note was given to you by your mother ust before her death to the Dark Plague, and your coming to Ghaarak.  It reads:

My dearest child,

Though death shall soon take me from this mortal realm, know that I go with no regrets.  When I look upon you, I know that my life has not been in vain, for I am proud of the adult you have become.  Whatever fate may find me in the afterlife, know that I shall do what I may to continue watching over you, protecting you from harm.

Your father shall watch over you when I am gone.  Do try to mend the differences that have grown between you, for he is a good man.  I know his duty to our Empire has often kept him away from us, but do not mistake his behavior for disinterest.  Okaris simply has a hard time with showing his feelings.  He does care for you greatly, and I can assure you your father will watch over you carefully.

Your fate shall be your own, my child, and I am sure it will be a grand one.  I wish that I could live to see a bit more of it, but fate has deemed otherwise, and who are we mortals to argue with destiny?  Know that I shall always love you.

Your mother,
Loralia
